pyevolcomp.Decoders package¶

Submodules¶

pyevolcomp.Decoders.CMADecoder module¶

class pyevolcomp.Decoders.CMADecoder.CMADecoder(nparams: int, pre_decoder: Decoder | None = None)¶

Bases: Decoder

Decoder used to implement the CMA-ES algorithm

decode(genotype: ndarray) → ndarray¶

Decodes the contents of an individual to a viable solution to our problem

encode(phenotype: ndarray, param_vec: ndarray | None = None) → ndarray¶

Encodes a viable solution to our problem to the encoding used in each individual of the algorithm
